description: NVIDIA vGPU software contains a vulnerability in the Virtual GPU Manager (vGPU plugin), where it can dereference a null pointer, which may lead to denial of service.

product.name: NVIDIA Virtual GPU Software and NVIDIA Cloud Gaming

enisaIdProduct.product_version: vGPU version 14.x (prior to 14.2), version 13.x (prior to 13.4) and version 11.x (prior 11.9).
